overview: A young Venezuelan idealist flees his native land to escape a revolution. Hoping to find peace, he goes to the mountains and the forests of the Amazon. There he encounters Rima, the Bird Girl, an orphan living a life of nature, who is feared by a local jungle tribe.
tagline: W. H. Hudson's unforgettable story of love and adventure in the South American jungles!
title: Green Mansions
